name: Yukon Gold Potato
description: Yukon Gold is a potato cultivar that was developed in the 1960s. It has smooth skin and yellow flesh that is waxy and moist. It becomes flaky and a bit starchy when cooked. Yukon Gold potatoes can be mashed, shredded, or used in soups and stews.
sowing_method: Direct seed cut tubers with at least one "eye" per piece.
